ComicInfo.Title: [Untitled]; The Amazing Journal Comic of Darwin
ComicInfo.Summary:
When Gumball suggests a game of tag to settle an argument, he fails to realize just how seriously people take tag in the town of Elmore! Can he handle being “it”? What depths will he sink to in order to tag someone else?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Missy Pena | 1 | B | Cover B | Christina Chang | 2 | C | Cover C | Garrett Hanna | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-25 19:51:50. [CVDB468118]
